allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add webfly_webf_view package for GoRouter hybrid routing

Extract GoRouter + WebF hybrid routing into a reusable package:
- GoRouterHybridDelegate: bridges WebF hybrid navigation to go_router
  with GoError-safe fallbacks during teardown
- WebfHybridConfig: strategy-based config for route packing/unpacking
  without hard-coding host app paths

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: rewrite LED effects as dynamic runtime with device-aware Canvas visualization

- Replace compiled-in effect logic with runtime-loaded JS state machines
  \(effect-runtime.js + per-effect effect.js\), compiled on the fly via Babel
- Add DJI Neo 2 device config \(86 LEDs across 4 rotor guards\) with physical
  mm coordinates for accurate spatial rendering
- Add DeviceCanvasView component rendering drone outline + LED glow on
  HTML Canvas \(dual-ref pattern for WebF/browser compatibility\)
- Replace fixed color preset buttons with HSV sliders \(Hue/Saturation/
  Brightness\) using FlutterCupertinoSlider for full color freedom
- Use FlutterCupertinoActionSheet for native device selection dropdown
- Pass deviceConfig + onTick callback from host page into dynamic effect
  code via componentProps, with shared Uint8Array LED buffer

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
style: dart format 4 files to pass CI format-check

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
